sentence.Network_en: The preparation process consists of pretreatment, acid hydrolysis , neutralization, decoloration and concentration.
sentence.Network_cn: 其制备工艺包括原料的预处理 、 酸水解、中和 、 脱色和浓缩.

sentence.Network_en: Decoloration of wastewater containing direct dye using magnesium salt was studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用氢氧化镁对直接灰印染工业废水进行脱色处理.

sentence.Network_en: And the mechanism and merits of decoloration coagulant used on treating dyestuff wastewater were reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对脱色混凝法用于染料废水处理的机理,及其优点进行了分析.
